dsOverview.title: Daily Argentina Time Series Radiosonde Observations, 1958-1991

summary.p: Argentina has provided upper air soundings for twenty stations for the general period 1958-1991, but the actual period varies by station.

creator.name: UCAR/NCAR/CISL/DSS > Data Support Section,Scientific Computing Division, National Center for Atmospheric Research, University Corporation for Atmospheric Research

contributor.name: AR/UBA > Universidad de Buenos Aires, Argentina
